Choose a faction (required) and any ship types (optional) or any extension (optional) then press the update button. Save or print using the browser's print command, choosing landscape and a 11"x17" page.

Quick builds are layed out for an 11"x17" page in landscape mode. The first group of pages should be cut in half horizontally, and the remaining should be cut in half horizontally and vertically. Inspect the PDF to determine how many pages of each.
